page.title: 14Housing changes. Rotherham.
page.content: Where I live used to be just fields with a stream on it.All the children who lived there played football and cricket on it.There were no new estates like now,some were fields, some were where other houses stood. There are more houses and shops where there used to be farm land.It was only a small village in the 1900's.There used to be trams that would run as far as Kimberworth Shool,before Old Hall and Kimberworth were built.A lot of old houeses have been knocked down and new houses built.
